values.name: Masked
values.doc: Mask the profanity with * except of the first letter, e.g., f***

properties.name: options
properties.doc: Metadata for a transcription request. This field contains a JSON-serialized object of type `TranscriptionOptions`.

properties.name: audioUri
properties.doc: The URL of the audio to be transcribed. The audio must be shorter than 2 hours in audio duration and smaller than 250 MB in size. If both Audio and AudioUrl are provided, Audio is used.

properties.name: locales
properties.doc: A list of possible locales for the transcription. If not specified, the locale of the speech in the audio is detected automatically from all supported locales.

properties.name: models
properties.doc: Maps some or all candidate locales to a model URI to be used for transcription. If no mapping is given, the default model for the locale is used.

properties.name: profanityFilterMode
properties.doc: Mode of profanity filtering.

properties.name: diarizationOptions
properties.doc: Mode of diarization.

type.name: TranscriptionDiarizationOptions
type.doc: The Speaker Diarization settings. Diarization settings must be specified to enable speaker diarization.

properties.name: enabled
properties.doc: Enable speaker diarization. This is automatically set to true when maxSpeakers is specified.

properties.name: maxSpeakers
properties.doc: Gets or sets a hint for the maximum number of speakers for diarization. Must be greater than 1 and less than 36.

properties.name: activeChannels
properties.doc: The 0-based indices of the channels to be transcribed separately. If not specified, multiple channels are merged and transcribed jointly. Only up to two channels are supported.

properties.name: enhancedMode
properties.doc: Enhanced mode properties.

properties.name: enabled
properties.doc: Enable enhanced mode for transcription. This is automatically set to true when task, targetLanguage, or prompt are specified.

properties.name: task
properties.doc: Task type for enhanced mode.

properties.name: targetLanguage
properties.doc: Target language for enhanced mode.

properties.name: prompt
properties.doc: A list of user prompts.

properties.name: phraseList
properties.doc: Phrase list properties.

properties.name: phrases
properties.doc: List of phrases for recognition.

properties.name: biasingWeight
properties.doc: Biasing weight for phrase list (1.0 to 20.0).

properties.name: audio
properties.doc: The content of the audio file to be transcribed. The audio file must be shorter than 2 hours in audio duration and smaller than 250 MB in size. Optional if audioUrl is provided in the definition.

models.name: TranscriptionResult
models.doc: The result of the transcribe operation.

properties.name: durationMilliseconds
properties.doc: The duration of the audio in milliseconds.

properties.name: combinedPhrases
properties.doc: The full transcript for each channel.

properties.name: channel
properties.doc: The 0-based channel index. Only present if channel separation is enabled.

properties.name: text
properties.doc: The complete transcribed text for the channel.

properties.name: phrases
properties.doc: The transcription results segmented into phrases.

properties.name: channel
properties.doc: The 0-based channel index. Only present if channel separation is enabled.

properties.name: speaker
properties.doc: A unique integer number that is assigned to each speaker detected in the audio without particular order. Only present if speaker diarization is enabled.

properties.name: offsetMilliseconds
properties.doc: The start offset of the phrase in milliseconds.

properties.name: durationMilliseconds
properties.doc: The duration of the phrase in milliseconds.

properties.name: text
properties.doc: The transcribed text of the phrase.

properties.name: words
properties.doc: The words that make up the phrase. Only present if word-level timestamps are enabled.

valueType.name: TranscribedWord
valueType.doc: Time-stamped word in the display form.

properties.name: text
properties.doc: The recognized word, including punctuation.

properties.name: offsetMilliseconds
properties.doc: The start offset of the word in milliseconds.

properties.name: durationMilliseconds
properties.doc: The duration of the word in milliseconds.

properties.name: locale
properties.doc: The locale of the phrase.

properties.name: confidence
properties.doc: The confidence value for the phrase.

properties.name: error
properties.doc: The error object.

properties.name: code
properties.doc: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

properties.name: message
properties.doc: A human-readable representation of the error.

properties.name: target
properties.doc: The target of the error.

properties.name: details
properties.doc: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

properties.name: innererror
properties.doc: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

type.name: InnerError
type.doc: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

properties.name: code
properties.doc: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

properties.name: innererror
properties.doc: Inner error.

properties.name: errorCode
properties.doc: String error code indicating what went wrong.

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.doc: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: body
parameters.doc: The body of the multipart request.

parameters.name: body
parameters.doc: The body of the multipart request.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.doc: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://westus.api.cognitive.microsoft.com).

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.doc: The API version to use for this operation.
